title: incomplete display of the input password dialog when startup
author: red-stream
body_snippet:
I've set "passwd protect" to yes. when reopen the software I got a incomplete display of the input password dialog. although i still can input my passwd to use it normally, but it remains a bug.
**mRemoteNG version 1.76.20.24615**

## Expected Behavior
display like the normal

## Current Behavior
It seems the **OK** and **Cancel** button can not be show out because of his too short and narrow parent box.

## Possible Solution
may be to consider of a particular Monitor Resolution

## ...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
